original_text: They gathered in such large numbers that there was no room left, not even outside the door, and he preached the word to them.
korean_text: 많은 사람이 모여서 문 앞까지도 들어설 자리가 없게 되었는데 예수께서 그들에게 도를 말씀하시더니

sentences.original_text: They gathered in such large numbers
that there was no room left
and he preached the word to them
